resources.string: Network connection error. Please check your network.

Network connection error. Please check your network.

You are not allowed to register multiple Lenovo accounts.

Register or enter an existing Lenovo ID to bind

Third-party account bind error. Please retry!

This function is not available in Airplane Mode. Please disable Airplane Mode first.
The current logging in has expired. Please log in again.
The current phone SIM card is not available.
The login attempts for today have exceeded the limit. Please perform this operation tomorrow.
Your apps have no privilege to perform this operation.
You have successfully registered a Lenovo ID. To secure your account please set a password
Please enter the phone number you want to register
Please enter the account you want to retrieve
The SMS with a verification code has been sent to your phone:
It is recommended to set a security email address so that when you forget your password, you can reset it quickly through the security email address
Verification code has been sent to your email address:
The password has not been set up yet.
This function will move all the data and information of your previous account to your new account
Verification code has been sent to your new phone:
After the account is successfully changed, the old account will be shut down. Please log in with your new account with the password unchanged.
Please enter login password for security verification
It is recommended to use your phone number as the account so that when you forget your password, you can reset it quickly through the linked phone number
The verification SMS has been sent to your phone

The account you entered has been registered

The email with a verification code has been sent to your login email address:
The SMS with a verification code has been sent to your linked phone:
The registration link has been sent to your registered email address
You have completed the registration. Please log in your registered email address and click the link to activate the account. With an activated account, you can enjoy more services from Lenovo.

Password format error (The password is limited to 4 to 20 characters, including English uppercase or lowercase letters, English digits, minus (-) and underline (_).)
